author: swertz
body:
#### PR description:

Update all NanoAOD producers to `Event::get` and `Event::getHandle`.

Also removed the `packedPFCandidates` input from the `IsFromLostTrackMapProducer` as it wasn't used.

I haven't touched a few plugins because they are apparently not used anywhere and should probably be removed in a future PR (`EGMEnergyVarProducer`, `EnergyRingsTableProducer`, `MuonIDTableProducer`, `NativeArrayTableProducer`); as for `GenWeightsTableProducer`, it is being rewritten in #32167.

#### PR validation:

Ran with `runTheMatrix.py -l 136.8523 --sites ''` and
```
cmsDriver.py nanoMaster --step NANO --datatier NANOAODSIM --eventcontent NANOAODSIM --conditions auto:phase1_2017_realistic --era Run2_2017,run2_nanoAOD_106Xv2 --no_exec --mc --filein "/store/relval/CMSSW_10_6_20/RelValZTT_13/MINIAODSIM/106X_mc2017_realistic_v9_miniv2-v1/10000/C80E4E76-F013-BB40-B619-43713A72C188.root" --fileout nano_mc.root -n 10
```
title: NanoAOD: move producers to new event getter methods
